Very useful for ironing men's suits without ruining their shapes. Normal press iron ruins the shape of the coats. Also useful for women's fancy dresses which are almost impossible to iron with the normal press.

Not too heavy
Wire length around 2 meter
Steam throw around 2 feet
Images attached of coat with one side steamed but the other without for comparison.
Holding in hand for size comparison.

items.reviewContent:
*YOU SHOULD READ THIS REVIEW BEFORE YOU PLACE AN ORDER*

This was one of the worst purchases I've made on Daraz.
1.  They delayed my order. I ordered on 11.11 and it got delivered on 17-Dec.
2. There was someone else's invoice inside. See the name Yousaf Zaman on the invoice (not my name). I have his number and address now which is a big breach of privacy. Likewise, I'm pretty sure someone else now has my name and address. So if you're someone who values your private info DO NOT ORDER FROM DAWLANCE!!!
3. The product is faulty and DOESN'T EVEN PRODUCE STEAM, like a lot of people stated in their recent reviews 
4. The packaging was also damaged on the outside as shown in the picture, however, the product on the inside doesn't seem to have been affected by the damage.
5. Not sure if someone else's invoice was left in the box as a mistake or if Dawlance just sent me a faulty already returned item from another customer. As the product shows has an old price of 7,200.
